BODY_VALIDATION.IS_DECIMAL: Property {property} must be a number or must be of type „X.XX“ .
BODY_VALIDATION.IS_ENUM: Property {property} must be one of the following values: {values}
BODY_VALIDATION.MAX_LENGTH: Property {property} must by shorter or equal to {constraints.0} characters
BODY_VALIDATION.ARRAY_NOT_EMPTY: Array of {property} should not be empty
BODY_VALIDATION.ARRAY_MIN_SIZE_1: Contact persons should contain at least 1 element
BODY_VALIDATION.IS_PAST_DATE: The date must not be in the past
BODY_VALIDATION.SHIPMENT_IS_PAST_DATE: The shipment date cannot be in the past
BODY_VALIDATION.IS_FUTURE_DATE: The date must not be in the future
BODY_VALIDATION.SHIPMENT_IS_FUTURE_DATE: The shipment date cannot be in the future
BODY_VALIDATION.IS_DATE_STRING: Property {property} must be a valid ISO 8601 date string
BODY_VALIDATION.MAX: Property {property} must be equal or less {constraints}
BODY_VALIDATION.MIN: Property {property} must be equal or greater than {constraints}

EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: To log in, please confirm your email address by clicking the activation link in the email we sent to you. Thank you!
USER_NOT_FOUND_OR_ACCOUNT_NOT_ACTIVATED: User not found or user account was not activated
AUTH__WAIT_ONE_MINUTE_TO_GENERATE_NEW_CO: You can generate the next code only one minute after receiving the previous code
AUTH__THE_VERIFICATION_CODE_HAS_EXPIRED_: The verification code has expired. Resend the code
CONFIRM_YOUR_ACCOUNT:
Confirm your account by following all the steps:
 1. confirm your email
 2. confirm your phone number
 3. upload the verification files and wait for us to approve them
ONLY_ADMIN_CAN_EDIT_OTHER_USERS_DATA: Only admin can edit other user's data!
MAKE_SURE_THE_DATA_YOU_SUBMITTED_IS_CORR: Please make sure that the submitted data is correct
AUTH__PASSWORD_MUST_BE_AT_LEAST_6_CHARAC: Password must be at least 6 characters long
CONFIRM_YOUR_ACCOUNT_BY_ENTERING_THE_VER: Confirm your account by entering the verification code sent to your phone. Also click on the activation link sent by email
CANT_ADD_OR_REMOVE_FILES_WHEN_SENDING_FI: You can't add or remove files when sending files ids
CAN_NOT_SEND_AMOUNT_WITH_PRICE_LIST_ID: You can not send amount and priceListId
ONE_DELIVERY_AND_ONE_COLLECTION_REQUIRED: You must provide 1 loading point and 1 unloading point

EMAIL_REMIND_PASSWORD.SUBJECT: Password reset - Galactic Pioneers

EMAIL_REMIND_PASSWORD.CLICK_BUTTON: Please click the link below to change your password.
EMAIL_REMIND_PASSWORD.TEXT_2: If you did not request a password reset, please contact us.

EMAIL_ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT.SUBJECT: Activate your account - Galactic Pioneers
EMAIL_ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT.TEXT: Thank you for registering with Galactic Pioneers.
EMAIL_ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT.CLICK_BUTTON: Please click the link below to activate your account.
EMAIL_ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT.TEXT_2: If you did not register this account, please ignore this email or contact us.
